title: Set Up UTM Tracking Parameters
description: A digital marketer needs to generate URLs with UTM parameters for a new email campaign to ensure proper tracking in Google Analytics.

tasks.description: Identify the destination URL for the campaign.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the correct base URL.

tasks.description: Define the UTM parameters: source (e.g., 'newsletter'), medium ('email'), and campaign name ('july_promo').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent defines a consistent and clear naming convention.

tasks.description: Use a UTM builder tool to generate the final, tagged URL.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a correctly formatted URL with all UTM parameters appended.
